meanings.definition: A small, nocturnal, jumping rodent found in deserts.
meanings.sent1: Jerboas are tiny creatures that hop around in the dark desert.
meanings.sent2: The jerboas scurried across the sandy dunes under the moonlight.
meanings.sent3: The jerboas decided to have a nighttime dance party in the desert.
meanings.sent4: The jerboas' leaps were like tiny springs bouncing in the sand.
meanings.sent5: I will never forget the sight of the jerboas jumping gracefully in the desert.
